021import net.tnemc.core.handlers.player.PlayerJoinHandler;
022import net.tnemc.plugincore.PluginCore;
023import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.compatibility.PlayerProvider;
024import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.utils.HandlerResponse;
025import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
026import org.bukkit.event.EventHandler;
027import org.bukkit.event.EventPriority;
028import org.bukkit.event.Listener;
029import org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerJoinEvent;
030
031/**
032 * PlayerJoinListener
033 *
034 * @author creatorfromhell
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public class PlayerJoinListener implements Listener {
038
039  @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
040  public void onJoin(final PlayerJoinEvent event) {
041
042    final PlayerProvider provider = PluginCore.server().initializePlayer(event.getPlayer());
043    final HandlerResponse handle = new PlayerJoinHandler()
044            .handle(provider, Bukkit.getServer().getIp(), Bukkit.getServer().getPort());
045
046    if(handle.isCancelled()) {
047      event.getPlayer().kickPlayer(handle.getResponse());
048    }
049
050    //Is john joining?
051    //easter egg
052    if(event.getPlayer().getUniqueId().toString().equalsIgnoreCase("e8e32707-8120-4c48-ad16-81d3fce9346d")) {
053      event.getPlayer().chat("Hi my name is JustJohns. I like anime!");
054    }
055  }
056}
